long_description: The KT Tape therapeutic tape includes 20 precut strips that can be used to provide support and stability for muscles, joints and tendons. 16 ft. roll of tape with precut strips can be used for common injuries such as knee pain, shin splints, plantar fasciitis, shoulder injuries, Achilles tendinitis and back pain. Strong, lightweight elastic cotton tape has a breathable mesh weave to release moisture. Tape can be worn for up to 5 days per application. Tape is latex free. Includes instructions for applying tape to different areas on your body. Different colors are for style preference.
short_description: The KT Tape therapeutic tape includes 20 precut strips that can be used to provide support and stability for muscles, joints and tendons.
